home.title: The Right Place To Grow Your Wedding Business
home.content_1:
You can connect to the 500,000 engaged couples who are looking for the right wedding
vendors in Bridestory each month ID
home.content_2: "Bridestory, has given a great impact to my business!" Vendor Name - Bridal, Indonesia ID
home.content_3:
Largest Wedding Marketplace
in South East Asia ID
home.content_4: 20,000+ wedding vendors from 70 countries have joined Bridestory to establish their online presence and reach the right audience. ID
home.content_5:
Search Engine Expert At
Your Fingertips ID
home.content_6: Our expert team will help you optimize your search engine result so you can simply focus on your business. ID
home.content_8: Brides-to-be are becoming more mobile. Our award-winning mobile app and website makes it easy for them to find the right vendors. ID
home.content_9: By being listed in Bridestory, they will be able to find you instantly. ID
home.content_11: Now you can reach more potential clients and grow your wedding business altogether. ID
home.content_12:
Go Global in a click
of a button ID
home.content_13: We enable you to scale your business to multiple cities and countries easily. Just add city on your profile and be ready to get booked by clients accross the globe! ID
home.content_15: Be exposed to our 3+ million social media users. We've been recognized for effectively using social media to help our vendors grow. ID
home.content_17: Be found by millions of engaged couples who use Bridestory every year from 170+ countries. ID
home.content_18: Interact real time with potential clients ID
home.content_19: See your business grow everyday, everywhere. ID
home.content_21: Your experience is valuable. We continuously optimize our platform so both vendors and brides-to-be can seamlessly connect anytime, anywhere. ID
home.content_23: Monitor your business performance around the clock with real time statistics, and respond to business inquiries immediately with our messaging feature. ID
home.content_25: Use our Bridestory Pro app to manage your business anytime, anywhere. Get it for free from ID
home.content_26: to grow your business with us? Create your FREE business profile now! ID
